body: Raised in the church of Asmodeus (whether or not you are currently a follower), you've focused your indoctrinated fervor primarily on the elimination of demons. You gain a +3 trait bonus on Knowledge (planes) checks about demons and a +2 trait bonus on Will saves against mind-affecting spells and effects from demons.
name: Asmodean Demon Hunter
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Religion Traits/Asmodean Demon Hunter
